content.rendered:
PRIME PEARL, Ibusa, Asaba

Prime Pearl Asaba is a beautiful estate in Ibusa, Oshmili North Local Government Area, Asaba, just a few minutes away from Admiralty University and Admiralty Estate. The estate is 100% dry and it’s in close proximity to favorable landmarks. With 100% of clients allocated, the rate of development in this estate is rapid. The estate is titled with a Registered Survey and Power of Attorney thereby free from every government encumbrance.

LANDMARKS:

  • Delta State College of Education
  • Delta State Immigration Head Quarters
  • General Steel Mill Limited

PROXIMITY:

  • 10 mins from Coker Junction
  • 4 mins drive from NNPC Ibusa
  • 6 mins drive from Admiralty Drive

ESTATE FEATURES:

  • Fenced and Gated Estate 100% complete
  • Good road network and street light
  • Strategically located in a conducive environment
  • A buy and build land o Instant plot allocation

COORDINATES:

684934.430mN    234464.580mE

TOPOGRAPHY: Dry land

DOCUNMENT TITLE: Registered Survey Plan and Power of Attorney

PRICE:
Promo price: 464 SQM – ₦850,000
Actual price: 464 SQM- ₦900,000

VIDEOS:

Prime Pearl, Asaba Subscription form
